entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 09:32 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 09:32 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:32 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
